products.title: Uniview 3200 Urban Dark Grey/white 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their uniview 3200 vertical blinds are flame-retardant, dimout screen fabrics. As a pvc / polyester fabric they're ideal for temperature control in offices and hot roomns. In addition to this, their 'magic screen' blinds ensure you can still see outside but don't let people outside see in. They're great for optimal privacy control and come in a stylish set of key neutral colours. Their urban dark grey / white is a bold, modern choice.

products.title: Uniview 3200 Spark White/grey 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their uniview 3200 vertical blinds are flame-retardant, dimout screen fabrics. As a pvc / polyester fabric they're ideal for temperature control in offices and hot roomns. In addition to this, their 'magic screen' blinds ensure you can still see outside but don't let people outside see in. They're great for optimal privacy control and come in a stylish set of key neutral colours. Their spark white / grey is a subtle tone perfect for any decor.

products.title: Uniview 3200 Prima White 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their uniview 3200 vertical blinds are flame-retardant, dimout screen fabrics. As a pvc / polyester fabric they're ideal for temperature control in offices and hot roomns. In addition to this, their 'magic screen' blinds ensure you can still see outside but don't let people outside see in. They're great for optimal privacy control and come in a stylish set of key neutral colours. Their prima white is a bright, elegant choice for any style.

products.title: Umbra Blackout White 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Umbra blackout is a stunning range of light blocking verticals. The fabric offers has a stylish two tone weave effect finish. This vertical blind works well inmost spaces due to it's blackout properties. Product id: sdb-vtb1490 fabric colour: white material: 100% polyester lining: colour match backing - see sample headrail: white slimline headrail supported by white steel brackets - top or face fixable slat width: 89mm control type: smooth chain operation with cord tilt or wand tilt and pull energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes umbra blackout white 89mm vertical blind in white.

products.title: Fuji Silk Snow Roller Blind
products.description: The fuji silk snow roller blind will blend seamlessly into your interior with its gentle neutral cream colour, while also adding a gorgeous texture to your window with its silky fabric. This blind is very versatile and can be paired in many different ways to create a modern, sophisticated interior. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Canvas Celeste Blue 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their canvas celeste blue vertical blind is a subtle and soft blue-green tone, perfect to bring some luxe and bejewelled tones into your space. Product id: db-vtb1403 fabric colour: celeste blue material: 100% polyester headrail: white slimline headrail supported by white steel brackets - top or face fixable slat width: 89mm control type: smooth chain operation with cord tilt or wand tilt and pull energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes canvas celeste blue 89mm vertical blind in blue.

products.title: Origin, White - Day Night Blind
products.description: Using sleek, modern threads, the origin white showcases a smooth and pliable, yet strong and sturdy, fabric in an icy lily white. The cloth hosts a sliding strip of white netting that can be raised or lowered depending on your light and privacy needs. Settle the white against a red feature wall in the dining room, pairing with wooden floors and contemporary wooden furniture. Include plenty of reds and whites throughout the room, perhaps in place mats and crockery, to bring the look together.

products.title: White Blackout Blind For Velux  Skylights
products.description: Some would say that this blind is too white. Those people are wrong. Being such a sharp white can only be a good thing, as it allows this blind to work like a dream in those crisp, monochromatic schemes that are so popular in homes around the country.

products.title: Turin 25mm Matt White Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: Their turin range consists of the most popular venetian blind colours. Look no further for a tailored product at a great price. This classic matt white perfect fit venetian blind is perfect for any room and will blend into any colour scheme. The perfect fit aspect of the blind means it will fit perfectly on to upvc window frames with no need for screws or drills - handy. Product id: db-dpfven0009 fabric colour: matt white s25026 material: aluminium headrail: minimal perfect fit framework - easy drill-free installation clip slat width: 25mm slat material: aluminium control type: tilt wand, tensioned cord-free raise.

products.title: Turin 25mm Pure White Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: Their range of turin 25mm perfect fit aluminium venetian blinds blend simplicity with functionality, and are perfect for the office - home or away. This pure white perfect fit venetian blind adds a fresh white shade to your home. Match with other grey tones for a modern style, or mix with bright accessories for a chic finished look. Perfect fit blinds are a drill-free and screw-free way to fit blinds to a upvc window or door - ensuring the frame warranty is protected.

products.title: Turin 25mm Gloss White Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: Their range of turin 25mm perfect fit aluminium venetian blinds blend simplicity with functionality, and are perfect for the office - home or away. This gloss white perfect fit venetian blind adds a fresh light white shade to your home. Match with other grey tones for a modern style, or mix with bright accessories for a chic finished look. Perfect fit blinds are a drill-free, screw-free method of fitting blinds designed for use with upvc doors and windows.

products.title: Owlet Canvas Roman Blind
products.description: Small feathery baby owls makes their owlet design a seasonal delight. Product id: db-rom0962 fabric colour: canvas material: 100% cotton lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets. Control type: smooth chain operation - great for a durable, even finish energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes owlet canvas roman blind in cream.

products.title: Velvet Canvas Cream Roman Blind
products.description: Their soft-touch range of velvet fabrics add a touch of luxury and softness to your home. A multi-tonal fabric, their smooth velvet fabrics create depth when catching the light, and can create different looks depending on the time of day. From cosy winter mornings, to breezy summers, velvet fabrics have been a firm staple in home and fashion since the 1920s and 70s. This soft roman blind in canvas cream, introduces a warm-toned cream hue to your home.

products.title: Crushed Velvet White Roman Blind
products.description: An affordable alternative to velvet, their velour fabrics bring elegance and rich texture to your home. Produced in yorkshire, we've included soft shades in their collection which tie in with any theme. Fresh white roman blinds, bring light and cool chic to your home. Product id: db-rom0868 fabric colour: white material: 100% polyester lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

products.description: Sundown chalk made to measure roller blind.

products.description: Crush whistler white made to measure roller blind.

products.title: Origin, Bright White - Venetian Blind
products.description: Pure and simple in colour, the origin bright white is just as sleek and streamlined in design. Thick wooden slats, formed from ecologically managed basswood, accompany high quality components in matching white, so that you can be sure of a coordinated look offering style and coherency. The bright white will look simply striking against almost any bolder colour, but for a traditionally coastal colour scheme in the bathroom, why not team with bright teals and aquas? Keep the base of the room white and use the gorgeous green-blues to accessorise.

products.title: Richmond (Blackout), Pure - Vertical Blind
products.description: Keep out the night-time light with the quality richmond (blackout) in pure; mixing practicality with style, this blind will help you to get the best night's sleep possible. And as if that wasn't enough, it also features adjustable louvres, which allow you to alter the light entering the room. Feature the pure in your master bedroom to benefit from its blackout function, and to create a sophisticated decor theme with alluring qualities.

products.title: Lusso, Pure - Vertical Blind
products.description: The lusso pure features a distinct and enthralling texture that is sure to catch your eye and create a sophisticated scheme. This modest blind presents a soothing white shade that will blend perfectly into any scheme, whilst also featuring adjustable louvres which allow you versatile light control. Complement the pure with a frame of sumptuous linens in deep aubergine or soothing cornflower blue to create a contrasting casing to help to boost both the texture and brilliance of the blind.

products.title: Nile Taped Slate Grey With Contrast White Tape Real Wood
products.description: Their nile contrast taped blinds come in several different tape and colour combinations perfect for any room in your home. This grey wooden blind has contrasting white tapes which create a bold and quality finish. At swift direct blinds, we take quality seriously. With over fifty years experience in manufacturing and selling blinds in the uk, their wooden blinds are made by their expert team, and packed and shipped to your doorstep.

products.title: Nile Taped Pearl White Real Wood
products.description: The nile taped range of wood blinds is available in several distinctive forest colours and also available in different stat widths so will suit any window in your home. The matching cotton tape adds an extra feel of luxury. This cream taped wood blind will look great in rooms with neutral decor or as a contrast to darker colours. At swift direct blinds, we take quality seriously. With over fifty years experience in manufacturing and selling blinds in the uk, their wooden blinds are made by their expert team, and packed and shipped to your doorstep.

products.title: Nile Taped White Real Wood
products.description: The nile taped range of wood blinds is available in several distinctive forest colours and also available in different stat widths so will suit any window in your home. The matching cotton tape adds an extra feel of luxury. This classic white wood taped blind will look great in any room in your home as it will create a fresh, crisp and light feel. At swift direct blinds, we take quality seriously.

products.title: Splash (Blackout), Pure - Vertical Blind
products.description: For a combination of iridescent style and practical usability, make the splash (blackout) in pure your blind of choice. The glimmering sheen will add life and sparkle to your windows, and the manoeuvrable louvres allow you to adjust the light to your liking. In an area where you need surfaces and furnishings that are easy to clean, such as the kitchen or family dining area, there's no better option than the pure.

products.title: Ajanta (Blackout), Pure - Vertical Blind
products.description: On a shimmering, off-white backdrop, the ajanta (blackout) pure features a cracked white patterning that catches in the light as the blind moves. With a durable, wipe-clean surface, this blind satisfies your need for function and practicality, as well as looking attractive and fresh. For a classic bathroom colour scheme, set the pure against blues and silvers, whether in the detail of the tiling, the colour of the towels, or the style of your sink fittings.

products.title: Rapture (Blackout), Pure - Vertical Blind
products.description: Somehow daring and discreet at the same time, the rapture (blackout) in pure combines an ice white background with flits of grey and dashes of barely-there silver, resulting in a gorgeous vertical blind that twinkles in the sunlight. The pure makes a practical option for a kitchen, where wipe-clean surfaces are a must, and would be accented beautifully by white units, grey appliances, and silver fixtures and fittings.

products.title: Affinity, Pure - Vertical Blind
products.description: The leaf-like patterning of the affinity pure will light up a room's dcor and you'll be sure to notice it catching the light. This blind blends class with functionality, as its cutting edge filter fabric and no-fuss louvres make this a usable and durable window covering. Go cool and fresh in the kitchen by setting the pure against sky blue walls and light, natural woods. This blind would also make a pretty addition to a guest or master bedroom, where tranquillity and calm rule the roost.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Snow - Vertical Blind
products.description: The beneficial and beautiful origin (blackout) in snow features a valuable blackout attribute, which allows you to conquer the night-time light. This quality blind creates a modern look with its brilliant white shading and contemporary, changeable louvres for the added bonus of your privacy and shading preferences. Use the snow in your master bedroom to benefit from its hidden blackout quality. Match the stark white of the blind with a creative, colourful wallpaper or simple, chalky pink paint.

products.title: Amor White Lotus With Haze Pure Double Roller Blind
products.description: Combining two of their most popular roller blinds in one, this amor white lotus and haze pure double roller blind gives you the best of both worlds. Keep the voile down in the day for light and privacy, then at night lower the blackout amor soft grey to block out the light. Their double roller blinds give you total control and practicality, with both blinds installed on the same bracket you won't need to worry about installing twice.

Their double roller blinds give you total control and practicality, with both blinds installed on the same bracket you won't need to worry about installing twice.

products.description: Their double roller blinds give you total control and practicality, with both blinds installed on the same bracket you won't need to worry about installing twice. Lower the voile fabric to give your home the daytime privacy you require. Gently filtering the light and preventing people from seeing in, this blind is ideal for those who don't want to be overlooked. products.title: Cotswold, Cosmic White - Venetian Blind
products.description: The matt, chalky finish of the cotswold in cosmic white is right on trend, and will work amidst a range of decor schemes. A matching wooden pelmet and bottom rail give this blind a streamlined edge, with no obtrusive detailing detracting from its effect. Perfect for a shabby chic theme in a light, vintage bedroom, the cosmic white will look stunning against sweet duck egg walls. Include pretty floral patterns in the room, whether in the bedlinen or accenting cushions, and don't be afraid to add a complementary shade of pink for extra depth.

products.title: Capri (Blackout), Pure - Vertical Blind
products.description: The delicate silver curve pattern of the capri (blackout) pure tempers the bright white that lies beneath, and catches the light at every turn. Adjust the louvres to control the light to your liking, and enjoy this practical yet visually pleasing vertical blind. By hanging in the kitchen, you get attractive simplicity combined with wipe-clean practicality, as well as a blank canvas against which to sit the rest of your dcor.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), White - Vertical Blind
products.description: Brilliant white shades are the most malleable of all, and that's the beauty of the palermo (blackout) in white. Adjustable louvres, that are easily cleaned, allow you to control how much light and privacy you have in your home, whilst allowing the light to bounce off them. Make a bold red stand out even more, or a forest green really come to life, by placing the white amongst them. Wonderfully suited to a bathroom or kitchen environment, where freshness and clean hues are everything, this blind can take part in almost any colour scheme.

products.title: Zambezi Taped Polar White Real Wood
products.description: Their premium zambezi polar white real wood blind features a off-white painted wood slat, great for freshening up your home. From soft stained brown shades, painted creamy neutrals to textured fine grains, this real wood range creates a natural chic finish to your windows. This white real wood blind would look at home in a rustic setting, or as a finishing touch to a neutral-toned room. Finsh with chalk coloured tape for a luxury touch.
